Name: zul-iqembulezifundi
Author: Iqembu Lezifundiswa, Mussa Muhammad Telela , Uthman Mfanafuthi Msomi, Moulana Abdur Rahman Chilipa, Haji Ibrahim Mondli Japhet Mthembu, Moulana Imran Ngcobo, Moulana Eshaaq Osman
Source: Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa(IDM), https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Futhi xwayisa ngakho labo abesaba ukuthi bayoqoqelwa ngaphambili kweNkosi yabo angeke babenomvikeli nomncengeli ngaphandle kwakhe ukuze e babengabalungileyo

Futhi ungabagxoshi labo abamemeza (abadumisa) iNkosi yabo ekuseni nakusihlwa belangazelela ubuso bayo, awunacala ngalutho kubona futhi nabo abanacala ngalutho kuwena ngakho-ke uma ubagxosha uzoba ngomunye wabayizoni

Futhi sabavivinya kanjalo-ke abanye babo ngabanye ukuze bathi, â€œngakube yibona yini labo uMvelinqangi abanobubele kubona phakathi kwethu na? Ngakube akusiyena yini uMvelinqangi owaziyo ngababongayo na

Futhi uma beza kuwena labo abakholelwa emavesini ethu ngakho-ke ithi (kubona) ukuthula makube kunina iNkosi yenu yazibhalela yona umusa ukuze noma ngabe ngubani owenza okubi phakathi kwenu ngokungazi bese ephenduka (ezisola) emva kwalokho futhi enze izenzo ezinhle ngakho-ke ngempela yena ungothethelelayo onesihawu
Futhi siwachaza kanjalo amavesi ukuze indlela yezoni icace
